meanings.definition: The quality or state of being marshy.
meanings.sent1: The marshiness of the area made it difficult to walk through.
meanings.sent2: The marshiness of the land attracted many waterfowl.
meanings.sent3: The marshiness of the field turned the soccer game into a muddy mess.
meanings.sent4: The marshiness of the terrain slowed down our progress like walking through quicksand.
meanings.sent5: The marshiness of the swamp created a unique ecosystem for various plants and animals.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of resembling a marsh.
meanings.sent1: The painting captured the marshiness of the landscape perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The new housing development destroyed the natural marshiness of the area.
meanings.sent3: The marshiness of the cake made it look like a soggy marshmallow.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a wild marshiness to it, like reeds blowing in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The marshiness of the fabric gave the dress a soft, flowing quality.

meanings.sent1: The marshiness of the air after the rain reminded me of my childhood by the lake.
meanings.sent2: The marshiness of the room was due to a leak in the ceiling.
meanings.sent3: The marshiness of the atmosphere made it feel like we were in a tropical rainforest.
meanings.sent4: The marshiness of the environment attracted a variety of insects and birds.
meanings.sent5: The marshiness of the setting sun reflected beautifully on the water.
